description: Gasses, slurries, pigments, infuse types, what's it all for?
/b/Mekanism/b/ introduces /b/Gasses/b/. The only way to transport these is by /b/Pressurized Tubes/b/. They simply are pipes (without pumps) that /6/spread gas around their length/6/.
Most machines in Mekanism handle gasses.

The /b/Thermal Evaporation Plant/b/ is an important machine for the production of Lithium. It takes water or brine, and with /6/sufficent heat/6/ evaporates the useless parts and leaves another liquid.

/b/Thermal Evaporation Valves/b/ within the multiblock /6/allow for the input/output/6/ of /b/fluids/b/, and the /6/input of Heat/6/ via /b/Resistive Heaters/b/, /b/Fuelwood Heaters/b/, or /b/Boilers/b/.
Here is a blueprint on the Thermal Evaporation Plant.
One /b/Thermal Evaporation Controler/b/ must be included in the walls somewhere.
The Middle Layer can be extended up to 16 times for a total of an /b/18 block tall Evaporation Plant/b/.
/b/Advanced Solar Generators/b/ at the top /6/increase the passive heating rate/6/.
